about_the_game:
Chibi the little yellow robot returns to your screen!

‘Chibi Reboot 2’ is a Pac-Man-like game in which you have to help a little robot and his companion solve a mysterious case. With Chibi you have to collect energy crystals and face various dangers. Underwater sharks, rocket fire or penguins sliding on their bellies. Steer Chibi through the new open world and face the dangers to restore balance.


What's new in Chibi 2?

  • A total of 64 stages, including 21 optional bonus stages.
  • 8-bit & 16-bit music.
  • Over 30 in-game achievements to achieve.
  • Chibi will be able to move around an overworld this time. The player can choose for himself.
  • 6 different items to collect to fight enemies.
  • 2 different difficulty levels.

Recommended:
